first_translate: I was worried  when I heard you defeated a dragon...
but this is too easy for me!
do you know how much you underestimated me?

hangle: 날 죽이려면 너 같은 허접 말고,
first_translate: if you wanted to kill me,
then at least bring along someone like fiona halyon instead of some amateur like yourself.
your highness!!!

hangle: 시끄럽게 하지 말고 문 닫고 들어와.
first_translate: stop yelling and come inside after closing the door.
r-right away, your highness.
excuse me...
cain ereze.
yes, your highness?
did house ereze send him here just now...?
did house ereze send him here just now...?
n-no idea, your highness...
good grief...
this palace makes my skin crawl.
it’s such a dump!
well, it looks as if he had nothing to do with what happened earlier.
I’ve been watching him closely,

hangle: 에레즈 후작과 달리 수상쩍게 굴진 않는단 말이지.
first_translate: and unlike his father, there hasn’t been anything suspicious about his behavior so far.
that's why I've left him alone until now...
y-your highness! did I say something wrong...?
had you done otherwise,

hangle: 내 호위가 암살자와 맞서 싸우다가 명예롭게 죽었다고 말했겠지.
first_translate: I would have killed you on the spot and told everyone that one of my guards died fighting off the assassin.

hangle: 역시 날 죽일 생각까지 하고 있었어…
first_translate: of course she thought about killing me...
I must choose people whom I can trust wisely.
that way, I’ll be able to protect myself.
as long as I’m stuck here,

hangle: 피오나와 나란히 있을 수 있단 말이다…
first_translate: at least I get to stay close to fiona...
I don’t feel like going to any ball right now.

hangle: 용병을 시켜 날 습격하게 한 사람은 대체 누굴까?
first_translate: who could have hired those mercenaries to attack me?
let’s not stress out over this.

hangle: 여기는 책 속의 세계다, 책 속의 세계다…
first_translate: this world belongs to a novel, remember...?

hangle: 원작대로 진행될 때는 안 좋은 일이 있어도 지금보다 덜 피곤했다.
first_translate: even though bad things still happened according to the original story, they were less tiring than all these events happening now.

hangle: 어쨌든 이 세계는 해피엔딩을 맞이할 거였으니까.
first_translate: in the end, everything will lead up to a happy ending anyway.

hangle: 그런 생각을 하면 현실을 그럭저럭 넘길 수 있었다.
first_translate: thinking like that helped me deal with reality better.

hangle: 끔찍한 마수가 튀어나오는 전장에서 버틸 수 있었던 것도 그 덕분이었고.
first_translate: that also allowed me to survive through battles where terrifying monsters popped out everywhere.

hangle: 하지만 이야기가 원작과 완전히 어긋난 지금은…
first_translate: now that we’re completely straying from the original plot,

hangle: 이 모든 사태의 원인은 내 아픈 손가락인 시그렌이겠지…
first_translate: the cause behind all this must be none other than my sweetheart, siegren...
my hand feels cold!
what are you thinking about?
I keep remembering the time I got attacked by those men...

hangle: 아, 길드장을 보고 왔다는 그 사건 말이지.
first_translate: oh, you mean the incident involving the guildmaster.
yeah.
siegren, has anything strange ever happen to you recently?
nope.

hangle: 방금 묘한 침묵이 있었던 것 같은데.
first_translate: wait, wasn’t there a moment of silence just then?

hangle: 습격한 범인이 누군지는 아직 못 알아낸 거지?
first_translate: you haven’t found out yet who sent them, huh?
if I knew, I wouldn’t let them go unpunished.
I agree.
stop touching me.
why?
there are lots of people around us.
what if others see us?
on top of that,

hangle: 난 이제 떠먹여 줄 생각이 없…
first_translate: I won’t give you food anymore--
s-siegren.
how dare you become more brazen every day?!
I love your hair.
it’s thin and soft.
it reminds me of spider webs.
a lifeline that saved me from despair.
I didn’t realize you felt that way...
siegren...

hangle: 그래도 자꾸 이렇게 만지면 정리하기 힘들단 말이야.
first_translate: still, stop playing with my hair because it gets messy afterward.
enough already...
siegren?!
j-just hold on.
sorry.
I'll stop doing it if you hate it.
no, that’s not what I meant...
then what is it?
to tell you the truth,

hangle: 너에게 어디까지 스킨십을 허락해야 될지 고민이란다.
first_translate: lately, I’ve been wondering how intimate I should allow our relationship to be.

hangle: 시그렌이랑 끝까지 가는 건 좀 그렇나?
first_translate: isn’t it weird to take things further with siegren?
or maybe it’d actually be better to do so?

hangle: 딱히 나의 정조 관념이나 부끄럼 때문에 그러는 건 아닌데…
first_translate: not that I care about being chaste or shy...
but since we’re lovers, shouldn’t it be okay?
still...
maybe someday, siegren might return to eunice again.

hangle: 그런 시그렌이 다른 여자랑 밤을 보내는 건…
first_translate: with that said, isn’t it inappropriate for him to spend nights with another woman...?
am I right?!
